product_name: The North Face  ThermoBall Hoodie Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face ThermoBallTM hoodie jacket for men puts revolutionary new ThermoBallTM synthetic insulation to work. Warm and light, it mimics down, yet still insulates even when wet.
short_description: The North Face ThermoBallTM hoodie jacket for men puts revolutionary new ThermoBallTM synthetic insulation to work. Warm and light, it mimics down, yet still insulates even when wet.
